snippet: The Chevrolet Captiva, which traces its lineage to the Saturn Vue, is a rare thing in the market: a vehicle that isn’t available to consumers but is offered only to fleet customers, like rental car companies.
abstract: Chevrolet Captiva, which traces its lineage to Saturn Vue, is offered only to fleet customers, such as rental car companies, rather than individual buyers.
lead_paragraph: The Chevrolet Captiva, which traces its lineage to the Saturn Vue, is a rare thing in the market: a vehicle that isn’t available to consumers but is offered only to fleet customers, like rental car companies.

headline.main: A Chevy So Exclusive That You Can Only Borrow, Not Buy
headline.print_headline: A Chevy So Exclusive That You Can Only Borrow, Not Buy
